/icons/azure stack/00965-icon-service-Mu.name: Multi Tenancy
/icons/azure stack/00965-icon-service-Mu.description: Azure Multi Tenancy enables isolation of resources, applications, and data between different organizations or departments within an organization

/icons/azure stack/10108-icon-service-In.name: Infrastructure Backup
/icons/azure stack/10108-icon-service-In.description: Automated backup and restore of Azure virtual machines, disks, and storage accounts

/icons/azure stack/10109-icon-service-Ca.name: Capacity
/icons/azure stack/10109-icon-service-Ca.description: Azure Capacity helps you manage and optimize your cloud resources, including compute, storage, and networking.

/icons/azure stack/10110-icon-service-Of.name: Offers
/icons/azure stack/10110-icon-service-Of.description: Azure Offers provides a centralized platform to manage and deliver custom offers for cloud services, allowing customers to create and consume customized pricing models.

/icons/azure stack/10111-icon-service-Us.name: User Subscriptions
/icons/azure stack/10111-icon-service-Us.description: Manage access to Azure services and resources for users, groups, or organizations

/icons/azure stack/10113-icon-service-Pl.name: Plans
/icons/azure stack/10113-icon-service-Pl.description: Azure Plans enables you to manage and govern your Azure resources by grouping them into logical plans, making it easier to track usage and costs.

/icons/azure stack/10115-icon-service-Up.name: Updates
/icons/azure stack/10115-icon-service-Up.description: Azure Updates enables you to manage updates for your Windows-based virtual machines (VMs) running on Azure, ensuring they stay secure and up-to-date.
